extDescription.message: An eye-dropper & color-picker tool that allows you to select color values from webpages.

closeAndExit.message: Close and Exit Color Pick Mode

buyRegisterTip.message: Click to Buy & Register a ColorPick License or Opt-in.

disablePickEveryTime.message: Do not start picking each time popup is clicked

bgPageUnavailable.message: Background Snapshot Not Responding - Please Refresh the Page and Try Again.

licenseExceeded.message: License may be in use on the maximum number of hosts.  License upgrade may resolve the issue... Launch upgrade webpage?

licenseComError.message: Problem communicating with license server.  Make sure your firewall is open on port 80 or contact your system administrator.  Please try again soon!

inappComError.message: Temporary problem with this payment method (Check your Internet connectivity), please try again later, try the buy license key method or contact the developer sam@vidsbee.com

inappPurchaseError.message: Unknown failure!  Check your Internet connectivity.

showndefaults.message: Please press save, now showing defaults.

loadsyncOptions.message: Sync Storage options have been loaded and saved.

pickEveryTime.message: Start picking each time popup is clicked

showPreviewInContentS.message: Show image preview near cursor while picking

ShowRGBHSL.message: Show RGB and HSL on page

autocopyhex.message: Attempt to auto copy hex value to clipboard

hasAgreedToLicense.message: Has agreed to Terms of Use

usageStatistics.message: Gather Usage Statistics (See Terms of Use)

shareClors.message: Color of the Day Statistics (See Terms of Use)

iconIsPreview.message: Use icon badge square color preview

appleIcon.message: Use Apple Digital Color Meter logo

showPreviousClr.message: Show Split Color Preview with Previous Color

fetchSync.message: Fetch settings from Google Account Sync Storage
